answers.answer: I am obese but my baby so far has measured where he is supposed to so I don't think so it all depends on ur and the father's genetic make up some women who are obese have small babies and some have big babies same with women whoare not obese

I do not think this is true..i think it has to do with how big you and your significant other were at birth. I had a friend who is obese, she was pregnant with gestational diabetes and they were estimating her baby to he 10+ pounds! He came out 6 lbs..lol some big girls have small babies and some small girls have big big babies.
I was overweight with my first and she was a perfect 7 lbs, 4.5 oz. I'm on track with this one, too and I'm overweight.
I'm pretty over weight and my first was 7-7 my second was 8-7 this is my third and measuring right on schedule

question: Hey Mommies, so I have been seeing so many articles saying if your obese whilst pregnant your baby is going to be overweight too.Is this true? What do you Mommies say?I'm on my 28th week. Pre pregnancy weight was 76 Kg and now I am 92 kg !!!!So I'm worried.xxx
title: Mommies that are obese... is it true that the baby is born overweight?
